product_name: Light My Fire LunchBox 3-Piece MealKit - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Ultra-modern and ergonomic, the Light My Fire LunchBox 3-Piece MealKit belongs in your backpack, boat, picnic basket or lunch box so you can enjoy a meal wherever you wander. Durable, lightweight and BPA-free polypropylene is dishwasher and microwave safe; it also floats! Set includes 7 x 7 x 2.5 in. container and a spork utensil with a combination spoon and fork; serrated edge on fork side bites into small cutting tasks with ease. Spork is made of high-strength Tritan(TM) copolyester that does not soften at high temperatures; it's safe for use with titanium and nonstick cookware. Overstock.
short_description: Ultra-modern and ergonomic, the Light My Fire LunchBox 3-Piece MealKit belongs in your backpack, boat, picnic basket or lunch box so you can enjoy a meal wherever you wander.
